root.name: ezmuze+ 2.0
root.description: The newest edition to the EZMuze franchise EZMuze+ 2.0 boasts over 1000 loops, more automation effects, and an all new mixer and Trigger FX system. EZMuze+ 2.0 offers the sounds from a vast variety of music genres from ambient to rock. Contributing music artists include The Hamster Alliance, Mad Ninja Skillz, Sary, Bignic, Ivan Ives, MegaJosh, Danielle, Spinor, and Emma from FilthyCake.

similar_games.game: MTV Music Generator 3: This is the Remix
